product.name: Golden LED Mirror Light for Bathroom Adjustable Swivel Head Waterproof Vanity Arc Arm Design Perfect Mirro r Cabinet Illumination (67cm12w
product.description: Welcome to our store! Elevate your space with our premium LED mirror light, designed to provide optimal illumination for your bathroom, wardrobe, home, or office. With its sleek and modern design, this versatile lighting solution seamlessly blends functionality and style, enhancing your daily routines. **Product Features:** - **Rotatable Design:** The 240° adjustable light head allows you to direct light exactly where you need it, making it perfect for tasks such as makeup application or grooming. - **High Light Transmission:** Crafted with an acrylic shade, this light ensures brilliant illumination while maintaining a soft ambiance. - **Water-Resistant:** Rated IP44, this light is splash-proof, ideal for humid environments like bathrooms. - **Neutral White Light:** Emits a calming 4000K neutral white light, creating a welcoming atmosphere in any setting. **Specifications:** - **Product Name:** LED Mirror Light - **Color Options:** Gold - **Material:** Galvanized metal and acrylic - **Size Choices:** Available in 41 cm, 54 cm, and 67 cm - **Power Options:** 6W, 9W, and 12W - **Brightness Levels:** 500LM, 720LM, and 1000LM - **Lifespan:** Approximately 50,000 hours - **Voltage:** 220V-240V **Installation Made Easy:** Our LED mirror light comes with a straightforward installation kit, allowing you to enhance your space without complicated procedures. For safety, we recommend professional installation. **Customer Support:** If you have any questions or need assistance, please reach out via email. We promise to respond within 24 hours to provide the best solution for you. Transform your environment with our LED mirror light—where style meets practicality for everyday elegance!
product.bullet_points:
• Adjustable Design: This Bathroom Wall Light features a flexible 240° adjustable lamp head, making it suitable for various scenarios. You can easily adjust the angle to meet your specific lighting needs, enhancing both functionality and style in your space. Perfect for adding a modern touch to your Bathroom Decor.
• Easy-to-Install Bathroom Mirror LED Light: This versatile Gold Mirror Light can be used as a Bathroom Vanity Light or for Cabinet and Picture Lighting. Complete mounting accessories ensure effortless installation for various setups. Ideal for enhancing your bathroom, cabinet, and artwork illumination with elegant design and functionality.
• Elevate your daily routine with our premium Kitchen Utensil Set, designed for durability and versatility. Each tool is crafted from high-quality materials, ensuring effortless cooking and easy cleanup. Perfect for both novice and experienced chefs, this set includes everything you need to prepare delicious meals. Enjoy a seamless cooking experience with our reliable Kitchen Utensils.
• ★ Lampada da trucco impermeabile: grazie all'impermeabilità IP44, la lampada da specchio è sicura da usare in ambienti umidi e può essere utilizzata come lampada da bagno. Utilizzando una base in metallo di alta qualità, dopo il processo di placcatura multistrato, efficace antiruggine, durevole ed elegante stile retrò.
• Servizio post-vendita: se hai domande, inviaci un'e-mail, ti risponderemo entro 24 ore e ti forniremo la migliore soluzione.
features: Adjustable Design: This Bathroom Wall Light features a flexible 240° adjustable lamp head, making it suitable for various scenarios. You can easily adjust the angle to meet your specific lighting needs, enhancing both functionality and style in your space. Perfect for adding a modern touch to your Bathroom Decor.

Easy-to-Install Bathroom Mirror LED Light: This versatile Gold Mirror Light can be used as a Bathroom Vanity Light or for Cabinet and Picture Lighting. Complete mounting accessories ensure effortless installation for various setups. Ideal for enhancing your bathroom, cabinet, and artwork illumination with elegant design and functionality.

Elevate your daily routine with our premium Kitchen Utensil Set, designed for durability and versatility. Each tool is crafted from high-quality materials, ensuring effortless cooking and easy cleanup. Perfect for both novice and experienced chefs, this set includes everything you need to prepare delicious meals. Enjoy a seamless cooking experience with our reliable Kitchen Utensils.

★ Lampada da trucco impermeabile: grazie all'impermeabilità IP44, la lampada da specchio è sicura da usare in ambienti umidi e può essere utilizzata come lampada da bagno. Utilizzando una base in metallo di alta qualità, dopo il processo di placcatura multistrato, efficace antiruggine, durevole ed elegante stile retrò.
Servizio post-vendita: se hai domande, inviaci un'e-mail, ti risponderemo entro 24 ore e ti forniremo la migliore soluzione.
